SBF Trial: The Last Day of Summer Camp https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/11/09/sbf-trial-the-last-day-of-summer-camp/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines OFTRNQDPTFFCNMNUUHP3IJMTC4 Nikhilesh DeWe weren't really sure if it was the last day or not. The jury determining Sam Bankman-Fried's fate had begun deliberating the charges just a few hours before, after Judge Lewis Kaplan had spent much of the morning and some time after lunch reading out a 60-page charging document. Surely a case of this complexity – seven different charges, billions of dollars allegedly stolen, questions about whether witnesses were telling the truth – would take a while.
